# MLModelStructure.Program.Binding

**Enumeration**

An enum representing a binding.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Binding
```

## Overview

A Binding  is either a previously defined name of a variable or a constant value in the Program.

## Bindings

- **MLModelStructure.Program.Binding.name(_:)**: The name of the previously defined variable in the Program.
- **MLModelStructure.Program.Binding.value(_:)**: A constant value in the Program.

## Getting the program types

- **MLModelStructure.Program.Argument**: A struct representing an argument in the Program.
- **MLModelStructure.Program.Block**: A struct representing a block in the Program.
- **MLModelStructure.Program.Function**: A struct representing a function in the Program.
- **MLModelStructure.Program.NamedValueType**: A struct representing a named type in a Program.
- **MLModelStructure.Program.Operation**: A struct representing an Operation in the Program.
- **MLModelStructure.Program.Value**: A struct representing the value of a variable in the Program.
- **MLModelStructure.Program.ValueType**: A struct representing the type of a variable in the Program.

## Conforms To

- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
